data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Ardahan, Turkey from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ardahan, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 39 believers in Ardahan, Turkey a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Ardahan, Turkey humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 39 believers in the state of Ardahan to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Turkish people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, make the 39 believers in Ardahan to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 102,761 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Ardahan, Turkey and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ardahan, Turkey has a population of 102,800.

We estimate Ardahan has 39 people who might know Jesus, 575 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 102,186 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,635 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ardahan, Turkey a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Ardahan
